long_description: Novara Rack Trunk has been updated with a wider opening and sleeker style, offering plenty of stable storage for long bike trips. Padded, insulated main compartment protects contents and maintains shape. Internal mesh pockets help keep everything in its place; inner clip secures keys for easy retrieval. Lots of reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Our Novara Rack Trunk mounts easily to most rear racks.
short_description: Novara Rack Trunk has been updated with a wider opening and sleeker style, offering plenty of stable storage for long bike trips.
